Parameters: the field to be used to sort the query results in ascending order, see @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#query#SortableField_E@ for the list of fields that can be used to sort query results
addSortAscending(com.google.android.gms..Description: Adds the @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#metadata#SortableMetadataField_E@ to be used to sort the query results in ascending order of the values of the sortField. Query results are sorted in the same order the fields are added.

Parameters: the field to be used to sort the query results in descending order, see @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#query#SortableField_E@ for the list of fields that can be used to sort query results
